means: Tape Read And Write Library 带读并写入程序库

word_mean: 用渔船拖曳作业，迫使捕捞对象进入网囊的一类网具。

sentence.Network_en: Any trawl through the band's interviews will reveal statements that are challenging and incisive.
sentence.Network_cn: 随便选取一段对该乐队的访谈都能发现令人深思、犀利精辟的言论.

sentence.Network_en: We did a wide trawl to find the right person to play the part.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们到处寻找一个合适的人来演这个角色.

sentence.Network_en: In trawl fishing, huge nets are slowly pulled below the water to collect fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 拖网捕鱼时, 巨大的网被缓缓地在水下拉过以捕捉鱼群.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (as a verb): probably from Middle Dutch traghelen 'to drag' (related to traghel 'dragnet'), perhaps from Latin tragula 'dragnet'

entry.def: If you trawl through a large number of similar things, you search through them looking for something that you want or something that is suitable for a particular purpose.

example.ex: A team of officers is trawling through the records of thousands of petty thieves...
example.tran: 一组警员正在翻查数以千计的小偷小摸者的犯罪记录。

example.ex: Her private secretary has carefully trawled the West End for a suitable show.
example.tran: 她的私人秘书已经在伦敦西区进行了拉网式搜索，以寻找一部合适的剧目。

entry.def: When fishermen trawl for fish, they pull a wide net behind their ship in order to catch fish.

example.ex: They had seen him trawling and therefore knew that there were fish...
example.tran: 他们曾见过他用拖网捕鱼，因此知道那里有鱼。

example.ex: We came upon a fishing boat trawling for Dover sole.
example.tran: 我们碰上一艘正用拖网捕鳎的渔船。

means.word_mean: 1. a long fishing line with many shorter lines and hooks attached to it (usually suspended between buoys)
2. a conical fishnet dragged through the water at great depths

auth_sentence.content: A trawl through the display cases could reveal...many...items.

auth_sentence.content: It was recovered as part of a general trawl in the ocean for biology of interest.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was recovered as part of a general trawl in the ocean for biology of interest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was recovered as part of a general trawl in the ocean for biology of interest.

sentences.en: We did a wide trawl to find the right person to play the part.
sentences.cn: 我们到处寻找一个合适的人来演这个角色。

sentences.en: The boat were out trawling the bay.
sentences.cn: 渔船已出海, 在海湾用拖网捕鱼。

sentences.en: The police are trawling (through) their files for similar cases.
sentences.cn: 警方正在查阅类似案件的档案。
